body.name: CLEVAST 6 Pack Bamboo Charcoal Air Purifying Bags(6x60g) Activated Natural Home Odor Absorber, Deodorizer and Moisture Eliminator, Purifier for Shoe, Closet, Car Air freshener, Pet Safe

features: 🍀100% NATURAL BAMBOO CHARCOAL: The bamboo charcoal bags are made of 100% natural bamboo charcoal, without any fragrance and chemicals. They have good absorption to remove odors and can freshen the air. Safe for children and pets.

🍀REUSABLE FOR 2 YEARS: Rejuvenate the charcoal bags by placing them under direct sunlight once a month for about two hours. It restores effectiveness and maintains the service life of the bag for up to 2 years.

🍀EFFECTIVELY REMOVES ODORS: Bamboo charcoal absorbs odor 10x than regular charcoal bags, eliminating musty odors with ease. We recommend placing multiple air purifying bags in different smelly areas around the house to maximize the air purification effect.

🍀MULTIPURPOSE FRESHENER: Crafted from a durable burlap bag with robust string design, these fresheners are easy to use and won't scratch surrounding items. They are perfect for small areas such as car corners, shoes, kitchens, pet areas, refrigerators, gym bags, and more!

🍀EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE: Customers are at the core of everything we do. If you have any problem with this bamboo charcoal bag, please feel free to contact us and we will resolve the issue for you.

NOTES: Please use according to the coverage area of each package. Expose it in the sun for 2 hours at least once a month.The CLEVAST 100% natural bamboo charcoal bag has no fragrance or other chemical additives. You may feel that the deodorization effect is slower, please wait for a while or put more charcoal bags. The charcoal bag is designed and intended to absorb odors and not to mask the odors with pleasant fragrance. It is natural and healthier than chemical deodorants.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets rid of odors
reviews.reviewText: They work great and are easy to match to any decor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good on puppy urine ordor
reviews.reviewText: My very good house trained little puppy had an aiming problem. I put pee mats down at night so that he can pee if he needs to. When he would use them he was always peeing the edges so some ended up on the carpet. I have a heavy duty carpet shampoo machine but it just wasn't cutting it. I finally switched to a commercial grade cleaner and turned his old crate into a potty for him since it has a plastic bottom and hung 2 of these charcoal bags in the area of his old pee mat spot and one on top of his new potty. Everything together has worked because there's no more smell. Hallelujah lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Effective but not a miracle.
reviews.reviewText: As the title says this is an effective product. It definitly helped reduce the odors in my home but it isn't a cure all. While they are considerably reduced the smells are not 100% gone.Overall I very happy with the product. It definitly helps quite a bit. I can not speak to the longevity and long term effectiveness as I have only had them up for 2 days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was asked to rate under 16 hours of receiving product. So far zero change, still smell the bacon scent and dinner from an hour ago. I have two large bags over stove and six small one around the kitchen. Hopefully will work around 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I started buying the Clefast air purifying bags about 2 years ago & I love them. They really work, last a long time & I will continue to buy them. They are a good value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: appears to work as advertised. This my second batch. Perfect size

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does not work: Updated from 1 star to 5 stars
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE 11/14/23 THEY DO WORK, it takes time. I was too quick to review. I checked under my cupboard last week and the smell was gone. I placed the 4 packets out in the sun, as directed to refresh, and will continue to do so...... OLD review ... I read all the positive reviews and thought, okay I'll give it a try. But like many of the reviews with one star, this product does not work. I first placed in the sun for a few hours and hung the 4 pouches inside a small cupboard which has a musty smell even after cleaning it first with bleach and disinfectant. I bought two packs of four. I opened one. The other unopen package I returned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Seems to be working
reviews.reviewText: Have this around my house ... no smell to them. Seems to eliminate odors (closet with shoes) other rooms seem fresher
Put these all over the house definitely helped me with my allergies and reduced the smell significantly (moldy smell) I would buy again and recommend.

Ich muss feststellen: nach ca. zwei Wochen in meinem unbelüfteten und unbeheizten Abstellraum mit Außenzugang ist der muffige Geruch nicht mehr festzustellen. Ich hoffe, die Regenerierung der Beutel im Sonnenlicht funktioniert, dann habe ich für längere Zeit keine Geruchsbelästigung mehr. Ich würde die Rezension updaten, falls ich feststelle, dass die Regenerierung nicht klappt. Bisher 5 Sterne!

reviews.reviewTitle: Très efficace contre les odeurs de souris
reviews.reviewText: Nous avons récemment eu une infestation de souris dans les combles qui a nécessité 4 (!) passage d'un deratiseur pour en venir à bout. Ces charmantes bestioles nous ont laissé un petit cadeau de départ sous la forme d'une odeur nauséabonde (urine vraisemblablement) venant d'un faux plafond non visitable au dessus d'une chambre. Ajoutez a cela le fait que notre bébé dorme avec nous et que nous ne pouvions donc pas utiliser de Febreze ou équivalent, et vous comprendrez que nous étions un peu désespérés. Mais ces sachets se sont avérés très efficaces, j'ai directement mis les 4 dans la chambre. Le premier jour il pleuvait donc impossible de les activer au soleil et effectivement ça n'a rien fait Par contre, le jour suivant, après quelques heures au soleil... Après 24h l'odeur infâme était partie !Efficace et écolo, je recommande vivement !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I hate new car smell........makes me nauseous. These definatley helped absorb the smell meaning I didn't have to drive around with the windows open to air the car for long. Look nice.
